inclusion.criterion: ICHD-3 diagnostic criteria confirmed by physical exam
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: confirmed by one-to-one physical exam in the ED

inclusion.criterion: no pregnancy declaration or sign of pregnancy
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: no IV fluid administration in last 12 hours
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: intramuscular diclofenac potassium ordered by physician
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: ordered by the physician (no history of known allergic reaction to diclofenac potassium)

inclusion.criterion: no other indication for fluid infusion
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: no other indication for fluid infusion

inclusion.criterion: consent to be included in the study
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: consent to be included in the study

notes: The patient is a 15 year old girl with recurrent bilateral headache. She has been diagnosed with migraine headache and is under treatment.
